item.description:
The concept is simple and hardly original..

Ride some, then eat some, then ride some more.


The idea is never to eat at the same place twice, and given there are 24 of these in a year.. it should not be too hard to do considering there are 19,139 restaurants in Massachusetts. A few thousand within 20 min riding to be sure.

A week or so before each event, this boilerplate entry will be replaced with information on the place and day & time of our next gastronomical adventure.

Looking forward to seeing you there!

Paul
item.name: Meals, Deals & Wheels
